name: Website
description: I love designing and architecting websites. I have two years of experience building websites for clients like EcoHome Atlanta, SuperGreen Solutions, and LiveYourLifeWellness. A lot of my inspiration comes from designer and developer Hannah Donovan, Design Engineers Jake Knapp, and Dan Saffer.

name: Chatbot
description: I arguably spend more time talking to chatbots than I do my peers. I have built chatbots using Visual Studios as well as NodeJS using API.AI

name: Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality
description: I passed my Unity Developer Exam in 2016, and helped cofound Realty In VR, LLC. I also founded Rooibus, LLC in 2017.
